io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.service

Interface NucleusSeenService


  • public interface NucleusSeenService
    This service allows plugins to register handlers that will display information when a player runs the /seen command.

    Plugins are expected to only register one NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider.

    Consumers of this API should also note that this might run asynchronously. No methods that would require the use of a synchronous API should be used here.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider
      A NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider object can hook into the seen command and provide extra information on a player.

      Registers a NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider with Nucleus that can be constructed using a functional programming style.

      • register

        void register(java.lang.Object plugin,
              NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider seenInformationProvider)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider with Nucleus.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin registering the service.
        seenInformationProvider - The NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the plugin has either
        • Registered a NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider already
        • Not provided the Plugin annotated class

      • register

        void register(java.lang.Object plugin,
              java.util.function.Predicate<org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandSource> permissionCheck,
              java.util.function.BiFunction<org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandSource,org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User,java.util.Collection<org.spongepowered.api.text.Text>> informationGetter)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider with Nucleus that can be constructed using a functional programming style.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin registering the service.
        permissionCheck - A Predicate that checks that the CommandSource has permission to view the information provided.
        informationGetter - A BiFunction that accepts a CommandSource that wants to view information about a User and returns a Collection of Text to view.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the plugin has either
        • Registered a NucleusSeenService.SeenInformationProvider already
        • Not provided the Plugin annotated class
